attributes.action: make prison sentance for pedophiles life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am petitioning to make pedophiles go down for life not a few years, and yes i do know about the Human Rights Act but some of it does need changing. Because all the government does with pedophiles (well it looks like) is rehouse them near schools,or even give them jobs in schools..but these days it doesn't happen very often please email me with what you and the government are going to do many thanks simon pullen aged 16

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/jail-paedophiles/

If you wish to write to the Prime Minister, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
